comments:
I'm getting the following exception.  I've noticed that the PDE tests don't all pass.  In general is the practice to avoid moving to I builds (and posting reports on them) if the tests don't pass?

java.lang.NoSuchMethodException: org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExtension.getDeclaringPluginDescriptor()
	at java.lang.Class.getDeclaredMethod(Class.java:1909)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.EarlyStartupRunnable.getPluginForCompatibility(EarlyStartupRunnable.java:135)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.EarlyStartupRunnable.run(EarlyStartupRunnable.java:73)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:815)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench$18.run(Workbench.java:1645)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
The problem you are seeing is what caused the tests to fail. Since then it has been fixed by the UI team.
